person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Budget and Financial Accountability - Trinidad and Tobago

description.narrative: An Advisor is assisting the Trinidad and Tobago Ministry of Finance with recommendations for improvements in the current Consolidated Fund Framework in an effort to move towards a modern treasury single account framework. This would include a review of the existing bank account structure, use of IFMIS to facilitate cash accounting, bank reconciliations and business processes. Additionally the Advisor is providing recommendations on the management and reporting of separate accounts in which dedicated funds are held specifically for project related expenses and recommendations to improve cash forecasting and management to facilitate efficiency and effectiveness in financial reporting and liquidity management..

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date
